finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

sentences.english: 0ne place where you find lots of backseat drivers is in politics.
sentences.chinese: 要说指手画脚的人，在政界你可以找到好多。

sentences.english: He lorded it over the committee.
The real leaders never act as a back-seat driver.
sentences.chinese: 真正的领导者不会是人爱指手画脚的人。

sentences.english: For example, even business line managers influence IT spending today.
sentences.chinese: 例如，现在连业务经理都在对IT花费指手画脚。

sentences.english: My world, round to less than you hand painting feet.
sentences.chinese: 我的世界，轮不到你来指手画脚。
